member.name: T:Bridge.Car
member.summary: Represents a car vehicle with specific toll pricing and discount methods.

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the car toll.

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of vehicle, which is "Car".

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.BroBizzDiscount(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the BroBizz discount for the car.

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.WeekendDiscount(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Calculates the weekend discount for the car.

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.WeekendDiscountBroBizz(System.Boolean,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Calculates the combined weekend and BroBizz discount for the car.

member.name: T:Bridge.MC
member.summary: Represents a motorcycle vehicle with specific toll pricing and discount methods.

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the motorcycle toll.

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of vehicle, which is "MC".

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.BroBizzDiscount(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the BroBizz discount for the motorcycle.

member.name: T:Bridge.Vehicle
member.summary: Abstract base class representing a vehicle with common properties and methods.

member.name: P:Bridge.Vehicle.LicensePlate
member.summary: The license plate of the vehicle, limited to a maximum of 7 characters.

member.name: P:Bridge.Vehicle.Date
member.summary: The date of the vehicle's passage, used for calculating date-based discounts.

member.name: P:Bridge.Vehicle.BroBizz
member.summary: Indicates whether the vehicle has a BroBizz device for discounts.

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the vehicle toll.

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.LicensePlateCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the license plate is valid (not longer than 7 characters).

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.BroBizzDiscount(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the BroBizz discount for the vehicle.
